section.heading: Withholding will.
section.text: Whoever, having possession of a testamentary instrument, willfully neglects, for the period of 90 days after the death of the testator becomes known to him, to deliver it to the Probate Court, or to the Register of Wills, or to an executor named in the instrument, shall be fined not more than $500.

annotations.annotation: This section is referenced in § 6-1071, § 47-368.06, and § 50-2303.04a.
